text: Hagi ana zupage kema erino vuno eno'ma hu vahetami huzmanta'nena ventefi ame' hu'za vu'za, knare hu'za mani'naza Sudani vahera (mago'a agia Kusima, Itiopiama, Sairini) vahe'enena ome zamazeri zamagogo fegahaze. E'ina hu'na Isipi mopama eri havizama hanuge'za, hago hazenke zana egahie hu'za zamagogogura nehu'za zavi krafa hugahaze.
